author: kotkov
msg: * subversion/svnrdump/svnrdump.c
(replay_revisions, load_revisions): Remove unnecessary svn_stream_close()
calls.  Wrapped STDIN and STDOUT streams don't have a close handler.

author: kotkov
msg: Use the standard way of initializing STDIN and STDOUT streams in svnrdump
and svndumpfilter with svn_stream_for_stdin2() and svn_stream_for_stdout()
functions respectively.
* subversion/svndumpfilter/svndumpfilter.c
(open_fn_t): Remove this typedef.
(create_stdio_stream): Remove this helper.
(parse_baton_initialize): Use the functions from stream API to open the
standard input and output streams.
* subversion/svnrdump/svnrdump.c
(load_revisions): Use svn_stream_for_stdin2() to open the standard input.

author: rwhitcomb
msg: PIVOT-978: Fix Calendar control to only allow valid years.
Two changes:
1. Add two static methods to CalendarDate to get the min and max supported
years for dates.
2. Then, set the Spinner data for the year spinner in the Calendar control
to have these values as the bounds.  Have to change the code to use
getSelectedItem instead of getSelectedIndex, because the index no longer
starts at zero, to get/set the year value from the Spinner.
There is still a small problem: when you try to display January 1583, it
needs to reach back to 1582 to get the start of the week, and then you will
get the exception.  Other than that, everything seems fine.

author: rmuir
msg: LUCENE-6789: change IndexSearcher default similarity to BM25

author: julianfoad
msg: * subversion/libsvn_fs_fs/temp_serializer.c
(svn_fs_fs__serialize_properties): Use the correct pointer type in a
sizeof() expression, for theoretical correctness; makes no difference in
practice.
